name: Dice Golf (ShrimpPongo, Apsel)
description:
Welcome to the fantastical islands of Dice Golf!

Get to the end of each stage by putting your die into the goal.

Although, I do wonder what those symbols on the die mean?

Controls - 

Click and drag with LMB to hit the die

Hold down RMB to increase the height of your swing

Press R to reset the stage

Press ESC to close the game

Credits - 

Created by ShrimpPongo and Apsel

A huge thank you to -

chriskalos, ZeSoundResearchInc., zolopher, Rocktopus, pel2na, Nox_Sound, juskiddink, and James.Keeble for the SFX

Camisado Studios for the wood asset

Claus Eggers Sørensen for the font
